ip.description: The IP address that was inspected.

whois_data.description: WHOIS/RDAP data including ISP, network, ASN, and location information.

reverse_dns.description: Result of the Reverse DNS (PTR) lookup.

geolocation.description: Offline IP geolocation data (country, city, timezone).

open_ports.description: A list of ports that were found to be open.
